name: Universal Control
description:
Introduction

Universal Control is a 2.5D puzzle mobile video game where players take control of a gigantic holy hand to protect the planet Earth from an enormous meteorite rapidly approaching. At this point, players need to successfully throw the meteorite into a black hole to successfully complete the puzzle and progress to the next one. However, the meteorite will find on its way different sort of obstacles such as planets or stars with their own gravity fields which players need to take into account beforehand when aiming for the black hole.

Controls

Keyboard and mouse:

  • Primary click: Select levels.
  • Drag & drop with mouse: Throw asteroid.
  • ESC or primary click on top-right red X: Return to main menu or exit the game when in main menu.

Mobile controls:

  • Tap: Select levels.
  • Drag & drop: Throw asteroid.
  • Tap on top-right red X: Return to main menu or exit the game when in main menu.
